sentences.en: At the championships more promising divers are expected to come to the fore.
sentences.cn: 在这次比赛中,估计将会涌现更多优秀的跳水运动员.

sentences.en: Divers had to rely on air pumped from the surface.
sentences.cn: 潜水员所需的空气是从水面输送的.

sentences.en: Divers headed into the shafts over the weekend but made little progress.
sentences.cn: 潜水员于上周末进入竖井,但没什么进展.

sentences.en: Five divers descended daily to look for teh remains of the ship.
sentences.cn: 每天五名潜水员下潜到水下寻找船只的残骸.

sentences.en: He chose divers of them, who were asked to accompany him.
sentences.cn: 他选择他们当中的几个人, 要他们和他作伴.

sentences.en: Lead weights and air cylinders encumbered the divers as they walked to the shore.
sentences.cn: 潜水员向海岸走去时，铅坠和氧气罐使他们步履维艰。

sentences.en: Meanwhile divers continue the delicate task of looking for 8 missing people.
sentences.cn: 同时打捞人员继续谨慎的寻找8位失踪者.

sentences.en: Often divers would squeeze through openings in the gun turrets.
sentences.cn: 潜水员惯常经由炮塔中间的通道挤出去.

sentences.en: Police divers have recovered the body of a sixteen year old boy.
sentences.cn: 警方潜水员已经找到了一名16岁男孩的尸体。

sentences.en: Six Italian divers were trying to live underwater for a while.
sentences.cn: 六名意大利潜水员将尝试一段水下生活.

sentences.en: The divers plunged into the water in search of the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: (潜水员跳入水中,寻找遇难的船只. )

sentences.en: The divers tried to float the sunken ship.
The divers were armed with cameras and collecting gear.
sentences.cn: 潜水员配备了照相机和收集用具.

sentences.en: The headgear with a glass mask worn by deep - sea divers.
sentences.cn: (潜水)头盔由深水潜水员戴的带有玻璃面罩的帽盔.

sentences.en: Two divers work together while a standby diver remains on the surface.
sentences.cn: 两名潜水员协同工作,同时有一名候补潜水员留在水面上.

words.tran_cn: 分歧；分叉；意见不同；分支
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大
不同种类的，各式各样的

trans.tran_cn: 不同种类的，各式各样的
